resources: ForzaUtils Forza Utils Ready Forza Motorsport (2023) Forza 7 Network Error" Please connect to the same WiFi network as your Forza game. Please forward Forza\'s telemetry data to: IP: %1$s Port: %1$d Note: If using SimHub, please instruct SimHub to forward telemetry data to the above Ip and Port! Retry There appears to be an error with your WiFi settings as we are unable to find the current WiFi address. Please ensure WiFi is enabled and the device is connected to the same network as Forza. HP/Torque Ratings Waiting for Forza data Gear: %1$d Horsepower Torque Clear Note: Ready Error IP Address WiFi Connection Connected Disconnected Telemetry Format DASH Port RPM Throttle Gear Settings Live Data No Data Available Forward Telemetry Data Setup Forza\'s Telemetry output to go to the below IP and Port. PLEASE USE DASH FORMAT! If using SimHub, please instruct SimHub to forward telemetry data to the below Ip and Port! Choose Source Select a source to view data from. The app currently only supports viewing recorded data or live Forza telemetry. Live Data Replay or Demo Live Telemetry Replay or Demo
